Detailed Description

ew::View3Landmarks is an ew::View3Widget item to display the landmarks in a ew::DataflowForm3.

ew::View3Landmarks is a class without assignment or comparison. There are private member variables.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ew::View3Landmarks::symbol_t

These are the possible values for set_symbol and get_symbol. The first, with value zero, is SYMBOL_CROSS.

Enumerator:
SYMBOL_CROSS 

A cross symbol.

SYMBOL_CIRCLE 

A circle symbol.

SYMBOL_DOT 

A dot symbol.
